channel.title: Rune-Cloud - Skilling/PVP/Economy - Join today
channel.description:
Welcome to Rune-Cloud 317. This server is basicly based off my old server VengPkers 317 server, linked here:[URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/advertise/148450-veng-pkers-317-updated.html"]Vengpkers advertisement thread[/URL], This server is a totally remake version of that, based off every little feature like the old times, and I am bringing it back to life. This server has the following features below:
[B]Top [COLOR="#FFD700"]4[/COLOR]th on RSPSCoding Webclient Toplist[/B]
Website: [url=http://www.rune-cloud.com]Page Redirection[/url] - This website is online 12 hours a day. Play Now: [URL=http://"https://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=RuneCloud%202006"]Click here[/URL]
Vote Now: [URL=http://"https://www.rspscoding.org/toplist/viewserver.php?id=575"]Click here[/URL] Vote Now 2: [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/toplist/detail/7869/RuneCloud_2006/"]Click here[/URL]
[B][I]Server Status[/I][/B]
[ul][*]24/7 Server Online [*]100% No Lag & Lag Free Server [*]Weekly Server VPS Restarts, due to maintenances [*]Server Constantly Updated[/ul]
[B][I]Combat System[/I][/B]
[ul][*]Player vs Player [*]Npc Vs Npc [*]Player vs Npc & Npc vs Player [*]Clipping Combat System [*]100% Magic Spells, Ancients & Modern[/ul]
[B][I]Other[/I][/B]
[ul][*]Same old home in Falador [*]New Starter kit [*]Working Minigames, CastleWars, Duel Arena, Fight Pits [*]Free User Commands, ::home, ::changepassword, ::outfit, ::viewprofile, ::help, ::commands, ::modern, ::ancients [*]90% NPC Spawns, going runescape style in spawns[/ul]
[B][I]Media[/I][/B]
[B]*Starter Kit[/B] [IMG]http://s16.postimg.org/uofnocfrp/starter.png[/img]
[B]*Duel Arena[/B] [IMG]http://s15.postimg.org/m9aav34or/duel1.png[/img] [IMG]http://s22.postimg.org/6zfcafd3l/duel2.png[/img] [IMG]http://s11.postimg.org/w7s1pvqn7/duel3.png[/img] [IMG]http://s21.postimg.org/zf09rwuk7/duel4.png[/img]
[B]*Shops[/B] - More coming soon! [IMG]http://s11.postimg.org/p5u43on1f/shops.png[/img]
[B]*Others[/B] [IMG]http://s21.postimg.org/pbg59i37b/finish.png[/img]
